code: import{toast}from'react-toastify';import Constant from'../Constants/AuthenticationConstant';import{AuthenticationService}from'../Services/AuthenticationService';import{History}from'../Tools/History';function Fail(){return{type:Constant.LoginFail};}function Request(){return{type:Constant.LoginRequest};}var Login=function Login(_username,_password){return function(_dispatch){_dispatch(Request());AuthenticationService.Login(_username,_password).then(function(_response){if(!_response.success){toast.error("Kullanıcı Bulunamadı");return;}localStorage.setItem('user_',_response.data.user.id);localStorage.setItem('token_',_response.data.token);_dispatch(Success(_response.data.user));History.push("/egba/web/");console.log("Giriş yapılıyor");}).catch(function(_error){console.log(_error);_dispatch(Fail());});};function Success(_item){return{type:Constant.LoginSuccess,Payload:_item};}};var Logout=function Logout(){localStorage.clear("user_");return{type:Constant.Logout};};export default{Login:Login,Logout:Logout};
